body:
hey @Osmose @mythmon regarding the [search/filter combo box](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2767162/20534798/c3d1f460-b09f-11e6-8051-27290a3235c8.jpg), if the user types into the text input, does that filter the dropdown menu? Or is it strictly for filtering rows via text search?

edit: @Osmose has clarified that the text input will filter the combobox, but then also save as a text search if user hits enter (a la new relic's combobox)
body_text:

edit: @Osmose has clarified that the text input will filter the combobox, but then also save as a text search if user hits enter (a la new relic's combobox)
body_html:
hey @Osmose @mythmon regarding the search/filter combo box, if the user types into the text input, does that filter the dropdown menu? Or is it strictly for filtering rows via text search?

edit: @Osmose has clarified that the text input will filter the combobox, but then also save as a text search if user hits enter (a la new relic's combobox)
